numberTimes = int(input())

def lengthRequired(data):
    data = sorted(data)
    data = data[-1]
    return ord(data) - ord('a') + 1
while numberTimes > 0:
    lenGth = int(input())
    data = input()
    print(lengthRequired(data))
    numberTimes -= 1
